page.title: 13TELEVISION
page.content: Television occupies a great deal of our spare time. Our class survey showed that 60% watch more than 5 hours television each day.More than 50% watch television in the morning prior to coming to school. After school 80% switch on the television using it as a programme guide.The number watching falls to 40% between 4 and 6 o'clock.Between 7 and 9 it reaches 60% falling again to 40% between 9 and 11 pm.64% of children have a video set to supplement their television diet.This is used by the children to record progammes shown outside their viewing time and to view hired films.On average 3-5 films are hired per week.
